question: How can we obtain tahaarah in our apartment after a dog had been living in it?
answer:
QUESTION
We will be moving into an apartment in which the previous tenants owned a dog. We would like to know how we can obtain tahaarah in that apartment when we move. Jazak Allahu Khairan
ANSWER


Share:
It is advisable to wash the floors of the house and the carpets (if any).
Using a shampoo machine to clean the carpets will suffice.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
